channel.title: Jason Knows - Your home for Indie Music Podcasting and interviews mixed with comedy and Film
channel.iTunes:author: Jason Engberg
channel.description: Take a ride on a musical tour with indie artists who are changing the face of the music industry. Our goal is to expose music that you won t hear on the radio. From labels with little funds or inclination to support their acts. We deal in music, interviews, gratuitous exposure and love to the ones who live for music and need music to live
channel.iTunes:subtitle: Take a ride on a musical tour with indie artists who are changing the face of the music industry.

item.title: JasonKnows 37
item.iTunes:author: jason knows
item.description: Episode 37
item.iTunes:subtitle: Talking Heads | Modicum | Nebula 101| Etherealvox | Whitton | Gina Marie and JasonKnows
item.iTunes:summary: Jason Knows Episode Thirty-Seven begins with a movie review of the Rock-n-Roll film, 'True Stories'. A special track is also featured from a 1976 Talking Heads live performance, never released commercially. A L.A. favorite, Modicum and a new addition to the JasonKnows catalog, Nebula 101. Also first time spins from EtherealVox and Gina Marie (special guest performance from your own, JasonKnows). Do yourself a favor and get as much of Whitton in your ear as you can!

item.title: JasonKnows 36
item.iTunes:author: jason knows
item.description: Episode 36
item.iTunes:subtitle: SpoofinStarTrek|KC Booker | Marisa Levy | Dylan Donkin | Annabel Chovtek | Alicia Champion | MovieReview:GarageDays
item.iTunes:summary: Jason Knows Episode Thirty-Six is a big spoof off the first generation Star Trek series. As always, the great music is what drives the show. KC Booker from the bay area, Marisa Levy from the shores of Jersey, Dylan Donkin representing the Hawaiian islands, Annabel Chovtek from the 'What is Indie' movie. Alicia Champion play "Come Over Here" and JasonKnows does a movie review of the Rock-n-Roll film 'Garage Days'.

item.title: JasonKnows MusicMash

item.description: Welcome to Jason Knows Episode 20. This show marks a begining of a new series at Jason Knows. The craft of the songwriter has sometimes been shrouded in mystery. Thanks to Sarah Green, we are invited into her world to learn how she bears her offspring of lyric and music.

item.title: Jason Knows for Thursday, November 24, 2005
item.iTunes:author: Jason Engberg
item.description: Episode The Beastie Boys are the LEADERS in music technology, their Paul's Boutique is one of the few releases grandfathered before the Digital Millenium Copyright Law and have recently put a large selection of acapella tracks for FREE on their website. This episode of Jason Knows focuses on the KINGS of Grand Royal, the SONS of New York and the ambassadors of the good vibe...
item.iTunes:subtitle: The Beastie Boys are the LEADERS in music technology, this episode of Jason Knows focuses on the KINGS of Grand Royal, the SONS of New York and the ambassadors of the good vibe...

item.title: Jason Knows Introduction
item.iTunes:author: Jason Engberg
item.description: Jason Knows Music Jason Knows Sex Jason Knows Writing Jason Knows Long Beach
item.iTunes:summary: The Jason Knows Podcast is focused on music that is out there some should have gotten more notice, others, could use more notice today. With the record industry crumbling and radio stations are crying to their daddy's, podcasting has enabled the average person access to the artists and the music and very soon, be PART OF THE PROCESS! I'll show you how!
item.author: Listen2Jason@JasonKnows.com
